posts.post_content:
It’s been harder lately to find nice examples of these anywhere.  But here are a few better cards…

Browne - Washington Variation - Sov 350 - PSA 4 - $1100. Now $1000
Hal Chase Blue Port - raw but nice - Ex, - $525. Now $450
Clancy AB 350 Frame - PSA 6MC - One of the more ridiculous qualifiers I’ve seen. Front is perfect side to side and slightly Oc T/B. Back is Slightly OC.  Should probably break and send to SGC - $old
Devore Batting SC 460/42 - SGC 40/3 - $125. Now $120
Duffy Sov 460 - PSA 3 - $525. Now $490
Ford Sav 460 - PSA 3 - overgraded IMO spot of paperloss on front $150. Now $125
Huggins HAM - AB350 Frame - PSA 3.5 - $1100. Now $1000
Jennings Two hands - AB 350 NF - PSA 6MC - IMO not MC just thin border on right - $2000. Now $1800
Maddox Cycle 350 - SGC 40/3 - $old
****
Huge run of “missing red” errors.  Many of them listed as such on flip. 
T206  Missing Red Ink – among first graded examples authenticated by PSA, SGC, BVG, GAI   Sold only as a group $10k. Now $9800. 
Beck  SGC 30
Ferguson  GAI 3
Fromme Cincinnati  SGC 20
Gilbert St Louis  raw
Lindaman  PSA 2
Niles  PSA 3
Ritchey  BVG 3  (no red on belt but not mentioned on flip)
Rucker Brooklyn  GAI 1.5  (Questionable, although “No B” on label – paper loss on back)
Speaker  GAI  A
Stahl  GAI  3.5
Starr SGC 55
Sweeney  PSA 2
Wagner bat left shoulder  PSA 1
***

Orders under $250 kindly add $5 for shipping.
Email sent on young and on group

Thanks Mike!

I believe that I’ve gotten everyone the scans they asked for.  If somehow I missed ya - just email me a reminder.  [url]Scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Cleaned up for sales.  All cards now reduced.
PM sent on Huggins AB HAM
